TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ServiceDebugElement extends System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BehaviorExtensionElement
Public NotInheritable Class ServiceDebugElement Inherits BehaviorExtensionElement

summary.span: 表示一个配置元素，该元素指定 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服务的调试和帮助信息功能。

span.span: Represents a configuration element that specifies debugging and help information features for a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果以编程方式将 属性设置为 `true`，则可以将托管异常信息流到客户端以便进行调试，还可以向在 Web 浏览器中浏览该服务的用户发布 HTML 信息文件。If you set the property to `true` programmatically, you can enable the flow of managed exception information to the client for debugging purposes, as well as the publication of HTML information files for users browsing the service in Web browsers. > [!CAUTION] > 向服务返回托管异常信息可能具有安全风险。Returning managed exception information to services can be a security risk. 这是因为，异常详细信息公开了有关内部客户端实现的信息，这些信息可能被未经授权的服务使用。This is because exception details expose information about the internal client implementation that could be used by unauthorized services. 当使用 HTML 浏览器查看服务时， 和 属性指示服务发布 HTML 帮助文件。The and properties instruct the service to publish HTML help files when the service is viewed using an HTML browser. 和 属性控制所查看的 HTML 帮助页的位置。The and properties control the location of the HTML help page that is viewed. 若要使用配置文件启用或禁用其中一个 功能，必须：To enable or disable one of the features using a configuration file, you must: 1. 将 `behaviorConfiguration` 属性添加到 WCF 服务的[ < 服务 > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service)元素。Add a `behaviorConfiguration` attribute to the [<service>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service) element for your WCF service. (在元素上配置终结点行为 `` ; 服务元素[ < > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service)上的服务行为。 ) (Endpoint behaviors are configured on `` elements; service behaviors on [<service>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service) elements.) 2. 添加到或创建[ < serviceBehaviors > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors)节，并使用与步骤1中的属性值相匹配的名称将[ < > 行为](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors)元素添加到中 `behaviorConfiguration` 。Add to or create a [<serviceBehaviors>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors) section and add a [<behavior>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors) element to that with the name that matches the `behaviorConfiguration` attribute value from step 1. (使用[ < endpointBehaviors > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpointbehaviors)元素配置终结点行为; 使用[ < serviceBehaviors > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors)元素配置服务行为。(Endpoint behaviors are configured using an [<endpointBehaviors>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpointbehaviors) element; service behaviors are configured using a [<serviceBehaviors>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors) element. 3. 将[ < serviceDebug > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicedebug)元素添加到步骤2中的[ < 行为 > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors)元素，并启用或禁用适用于方案的各种属性。Add a [<serviceDebug>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicedebug) element to the [<behavior>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors) element from step 2 and enable or disable the various properties appropriate to your scenario. 有关具体示例的信息，请参见“示例”部分。For a specific example, see the Example section. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用配置文件来启用 HTML 帮助页功能，并将 SOAP 错误内部的异常信息返回到客户端以便进行调试（另外还启用元数据支持）。The following code example shows how to use a configuration file to enable the HTML help page feature and return exception information inside a SOAP fault back to the client for debugging purposes (in addition to enabling metadata support). [!code-xml[ServiceDebugBehaviorConfig#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/servicedebugbehaviorconfig/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#1)]

span.span: <serviceDebug>

public: property System::String ^ HttpHelpPageBinding { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.HttpHelpPageBinding : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串值，指定利用 HTTP 访问服务帮助页时使用绑定。

span.span: Gets or sets a string value that specifies the binding to be used when HTTP is utilized to access the service help page.

value.span: 指定利用 HTTP 访问服务帮助页时使用绑定。

span.span: The binding to be used when HTTP is utilized to access the service help page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未设置此属性，则在适当的情况下使用默认绑定 (HttpTransportBindingElement) 进行服务帮助页面访问。If this property is not set, the default binding (HttpTransportBindingElement) is used for service help page access as appropriate.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ HttpHelpPageBindingConfiguration { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.HttpHelpPageBindingConfiguration : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指向 XML 节的字符串，该 XML 节定义 中指定的绑定的附加配置信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that points to an XML section defining additional configuration information for the binding specified in .

value.span: 一个 XML 节定义 中指定的绑定的附加配置信息。

span.span: An XML section defining additional configuration information for the binding specified in .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HttpHelpPageEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.HttpHelpPageEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 是否在由 属性指定的地址发布 HTML 帮助页。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) publishes an HTML help page at the address specified by the property.

value.span: 如果 WCF 发布 HTML 帮助页，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if WCF publishes an HTML help page; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将此属性设置为 `false` 以禁止发布对于 HTML 浏览器可见的 HTML 帮助页。You can set this property to `false` to disable the publication of an HTML help page visible to HTML browsers. 若要确保在由 属性控制的位置发布 HTML 帮助页，必须将此属性设置为 `true`。To ensure the HTML help page is published at the location controlled by the property, you must set this property to `true`. 另外，还必须满足以下条件之一：In addition, one of the following conditions must also be met: - 属性是支持 HTTP 协议方案的绝对地址。The property is an absolute address that supports the HTTP protocol scheme. - 服务有支持 HTTP 协议方案的基址。There is a base address for the service that supports the HTTP protocol scheme. 尽管为 属性指定不支持 HTTP 协议方案的绝对地址会引发异常，但不满足前面两个条件的任何其他方案都不会引发异常，也不会发布 HTML 帮助页。Although an exception is thrown if an absolute address that does not support the HTTP protocol scheme is assigned to the property, any other scenario in which neither of the preceding criteria is met results in no exception and no HTML help page.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Uri ^ HttpHelpPageUrl { Uri ^ get(); void set(Uri ^ value); };
member this.HttpHelpPageUrl : Uri with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置发布 HTML 帮助文件的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location at which the HTML help file is published.

value.span: 在使用 HTML 浏览器查看终结点时，用户所见自定义 HTML 帮助文件的基于 HTTP 的相对或绝对 URL。

span.span: The relative or absolute HTTP-based URL of the custom HTML help file the user sees when the endpoint is viewed using an HTML browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性启用自定义 HTML 帮助文件的使用，例如，从 HTML 浏览器通过 HTTP/Get 请求返回的帮助文件。You can use this property to enable the use of a custom HTML help file that is returned from an HTTP/Get request, for example, from an HTML browser. HTML 帮助文件位置的解析方式如下。The location of the HTML help file is resolved as follows. 1. 如果此属性的值是相对地址，则 HTML 帮助文件的位置是支持 HTTP 请求的服务基址加上此属性的值。If the value of this property is a relative address, the location of the HTML help file is the value of the service base address that supports HTTP requests, plus this property value. 2. 如果此属性的值是绝对地址并支持 HTTP 请求，则 HTML 帮助文件的位置是此属性的值。If the value of this property is an absolute address and supports HTTP requests, the location of the HTML help file is the value of this property. 3. 如果此属性的值是绝对地址但不支持 HTTP 请求，则会引发异常。If the value of this property is absolute but does not support HTTP requests, an exception is thrown. 仅当 属性为 `true` 时，此属性才有效。This property is valid only when the property is `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ HttpsHelpPageBinding { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.HttpsHelpPageBinding : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串值，指定利用 HTTPS 访问服务帮助页时使用绑定。

span.span: Gets or sets a string value that specifies the binding to be used when HTTPS is utilized to access the service help page.

value.span: 指定利用 HTTPS 访问服务帮助页时使用绑定。

span.span: The binding to be used when HTTPS is utilized to access the service help page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未设置此属性，则在适当的情况下使用默认绑定 (HttpsTransportBindingElement) 进行服务帮助页面访问。If this property is not set, the default binding (HttpsTransportBindingElement) is used for service help page access as appropriate.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ HttpsHelpPageBindingConfiguration { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

span.span: Gets or sets a string that points to an XML section defining additional configuration information for the binding specified in .

value.span: 一个 XML 节定义 中指定的绑定的附加配置信息。

span.span: An XML section defining additional configuration information for the binding specified in .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HttpsHelpPageEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.HttpsHelpPageEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 是否在由 属性指定的地址通过 HTTPS 返回 HTML 帮助文件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) returns an HTML help file over HTTPS at the address specified by the property.

value.span: 如果将 HTML 帮助文件返回到发出 HTTPS/GET 请求的客户端（例如，从 HTML 浏览器），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if an HTML help file is returned to clients making an HTTPS/GET request, for example, from an HTML browser; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将此属性设置为 `false` 以禁止发布对于 HTML 浏览器可见的 HTML 帮助页。You can set this property to `false` to disable the publication of an HTML help page visible to HTML browsers. 若要确保在由 属性控制的位置发布 HTML 帮助页，必须将此属性设置为 `true`。To ensure the HTML help page is published at the location controlled by the property, you must set this property to `true`. 另外，还必须满足以下条件之一：In addition, one of the following conditions must also be met: - 属性是支持 HTTPS 协议方案的绝对地址。The property is an absolute address that supports the HTTPS protocol scheme. - 服务有支持 HTTPS 协议方案的基址。There is a base address for the service that supports the HTTPS protocol scheme. - 尽管为 属性指定不支持 HTTPS 协议方案的绝对地址会引发异常，但不满足前面两个条件的任何其他方案都不会引发异常，也不会发布 HTML 帮助页。Although an exception is thrown if an absolute address that does not support the HTTPS protocol scheme is assigned to the property, any other scenario in which neither of the preceding criteria is met results in no exception and no HTML help page.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Uri ^ HttpsHelpPageUrl { Uri ^ get(); void set(Uri ^ value); };
member this.HttpsHelpPageUrl : Uri with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置发布 HTML 帮助文件以便使用 HTTPS 进行帮助的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location at which an HTML help file is published for retrieval using HTTPS.

value.span: 在使用 HTML 浏览器查看终结点时，用户所见自定义 HTML 帮助文件的基于 HTTPS 的相对或绝对 URL。

span.span: The relative or absolute HTTPS-based URL of the custom HTML help file the user sees when the endpoint is viewed using an HTML browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性启用自定义 HTML 帮助文件的使用，例如，从 HTML 浏览器通过 HTTPS/Get 请求返回的帮助文件。You can use this property to enable the use of a custom HTML help file that is returned from an HTTPS/Get request, for example, from an HTML browser. HTML 帮助文件位置的解析方式如下。The location of the HTML help file is resolved as follows. 1. 如果此属性的值是相对地址，则 HTML 帮助文件的位置是支持 HTTPS 请求的服务基址加上此属性值的值。If the value of this property is a relative address, the location of the HTML help file is the value of the service base address that supports HTTPS requests, plus this property value. 2. 如果此属性的值是绝对地址并支持 HTTPS 请求，则 HTML 帮助文件的位置是此属性的值。If the value of this property is an absolute address and supports HTTPS requests, the location of the HTML help file is the value of this property. 3. 如果此属性的值是绝对地址但不支持 HTTPS 请求，则会引发异常。If the value of this property is absolute but does not support HTTPS requests, an exception is thrown. 仅当 属性为 `true` 时，此属性才有效。This property is valid only when the property is `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定在返回客户端以供调试的 SOAP 错误详细信息中是否包含托管异常信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to include managed exception information in the detail of SOAP faults returned to the client for debugging purposes.

value.span: 如果 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 在 SOAP 错误中返回托管异常信息，以便进行客户端调试，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) returns managed exception information in the SOAP faults for client-side debugging purposes; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果以编程方式将 属性设置为 `true`，则可以将托管异常信息流到客户端以便进行调试，还可以向在 Web 浏览器中浏览该服务的用户发布 HTML 信息文件。If you set the property to `true` programmatically, you can enable the flow of managed exception information to the client for debugging purposes, as well as the publication of HTML information files for users browsing the service in Web browsers. > [!CAUTION] > 向服务返回托管异常信息可能具有安全风险。Returning managed exception information to services can be a security risk. 这是因为，异常详细信息公开了有关内部客户端实现的信息，这些信息可能被未经授权的服务使用。This is because exception details expose information about the internal client implementation that could be used by unauthorized services.
